message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $11000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9500. Can you consider that price?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer it to you for $10500. It's the lowest price I'm willing to accept. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to go up to $10000. Can you meet me at that price?
